aboutData.description: Welcome to the official portal of the UNIMY Student Representative Council (SRC). We are a student-elected body dedicated to serving as the bridge between the student community and the university administration.
aboutData.mission: To proactively advocate for student rights, enhance the quality of campus life through diverse events, and foster a supportive academic environment for all majors.
aboutData.vision: To cultivate a united, empowered, and dynamic student community that produces future-ready leaders and innovators.
aboutData.role: We facilitate communication, manage student clubs & societies, provide welfare support, and organize skill-building workshops.

faqs.question: How do I reset my student portal password?
faqs.answer: Contact the IT Helpdesk at Level 2 or email it@unimy.edu.my.

faqs.question: How do I join a club?
faqs.answer: Visit the 'Clubs' tab or attend the Club Fair during orientation week.

faqs.question: Where is the SRC office?
faqs.answer: We are located at the Student Hub, Level 1, opposite the cafeteria.
